name: Circus Training
description:
In the Circus just arrived in the city, the seal is trained for the show tonight.
Avoid dropping the balls that the trainer throws at you and try to keep them in the air as much as possible!
The better you get, the more balls you will throw and it will be really hard to make a show without errors!
A brand new adrenaline-pumped Vintage Game never seen before to add to your collection!
Challenge your friends to beat your records!
The incredible experience of diving into the 80s while having fun with the exciting hand-held LCD game consoles. Graphics, sounds, visual effects are faithfully reproduced and designed to make you totally immerse in the game.
Try the simple game A and the most difficult game B.
Collect all the 'Back to the 80's' Games!
